sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Set State to Approved - Ready to Finalize
Wait until Action Requested is a Resubmittal
Set State to Re-submit and Approval to Rejected
Set State to Pending, Approval to Requested, and Reset Action Requested back to Review and Respond
Send Response Requested - No Due Date Notification
Send Revised Letter Approval Request Notification
Wait until Approval is Approved or Rejected
Send Response Requested - With Due Date Notification
Set State to Pending and Approval to Requested
